title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 59.2 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 59.2 - Introduction

State Regulations

This Part requires that reflective tires or spoke mounted
reflex reflectors be of a type approved by the Commissioner of Motor Vehicles. In promulgating this Part, the commissioner acknowledges that the Consumer

Product Safety Commission has preempted the field. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
59.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
